channel.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
channel.description:
Permission given by Moparisthebest.
Did not know quite where to put this, so stuck it in here. Kind of belongs here sice we are "developing" new forums.
[center][size=14pt][b]RuneADV[/b][/size] Making our move...[/center]
[center][b]RuneADV[/b] is a new forums created by myself and Rat Dawg in a hope to further the RuneScape Private Server World. The forums were specially made for more advanced coders to go, share their codes without the fear of them getting leeched, and ask for help without the fear of getting flamed. To enforce only advanced coders get access to the bulf of the forums,. we have set up an "application" format to try and join the forums, but beware, not anyone will be accepted. You must prove that you are a good coder to either myself or Rat Dawg, and we will accept you.
[b]Link: http://runeadv.com[/b]
Learn, code, enjoy![/center]
~ Budda

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

It was worth a try. Better asking it that going and bumping this topic every day.

If I can manage to get permission from mopar to sticky will you?

~ Budda

Read full topic

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:11, topic:64174”]The problem with using a free-type of forums is that they are lame, which is why we went with vBulletin. We can change skins later, but for now we will stick with satellite as people are more familiar with it and is easiest to navigate.

~ Budda[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 12:16:39 AM[/size][hr]Nothing more to say…

A mod please sticky. This thread is going to be kept alive one way or another, would be easiest for me if it was stickied :p.

~ Budda[/quote] dont ask for topics to be stickied, now since you just posted that, it wont be stickied now.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

i havent checked it out yet, but i wud sugest usign a better layout, this sites layout is used everywere, like u hsud get simple machines forums or phpbb2i have an example at http://mixscape.no-ip.bix/mixscape/forums/index.php i think thats it…

Read full topic

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Lol, thanks Godsend.

Request to mods. Please sticky this thread. These forums are going to ebcome one of the ‘main’ private server sites. Myself and Rat Dawg are going to stick with it until this is achieved, and it is really hard to advertise when this thread gets lost through the pages after 30mins.
Also the fact that the 11yr old in charge of rune-server has a problem with me doesn’t help a whole lot.

Thanks if you can,
~ Budda

P.S. All mods are invited to join ;). If you are good enough to get Mopar’s seal of approval, you are good enough for RuneADV.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @godsend19921992 godsend19921992
item.description:
@godsend19921992 wrote:

It’s a good site… what can i say… it has the Godsend Brand of approval ;D

Read full topic

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Thanks Tasty ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 01:06:06 PM[/size][hr]Added IRC to the site. A Java IRC app, so you click the link and go to the page which connects to the IRC. No customizing needed.

~ Budda[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 08:58:14 PM[/size][hr]Starting work on a completely new server for RuneADV. The official server. We’ve managed to delete all objects, can change NPC names, all with no lag. Once it’s done,we’re hoping that will attract more members. =/.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tasty_noob tasty noob
item.description:
@tasty_noob wrote:

nice site. This site is for developing private servers to higher standards.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

This site is very low membered at the moment, but it is making progress at a very fast pace! 118 posts in less than 24 hours! I’d have to call that growing!

I’m also the one who put the main front-page up (the coding for it), so i’ll be helping around this site for as long as it’s up.

~Z

Read full topic

item.title: RuneADV - New Advanced Coders Forum
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

It will. We already have a bunch of dedicated members that have said that this will be their main forums.

~ Budda

Read full topic
